absolutePosition.notes: Absolute position not returned; relative insets available

relativeInsets.notes: Extracted from get_code: 'inset-[8.33%_12.5%_58.33%_54.16%]' (top, right, bottom, left)

visualSize.notes: Consistent with calculated size; small notification indicator

color.notes: Extracted from get_variable_defs; solid fill, no transparency

offset.notes: Positioned near top-right corner of bell icon

shape.notes: Circular shape; no border-radius for ellipse nodes

border.notes: No visible border; solid fill only

visibility.notes: Dot visible in screenshot; likely controlled by component property in production

iconContainer.notes: Dot positioned relative to 20×20px icon group, not full 40×40px container

iconGroup.position: Centered in 40×40px container (10px padding all sides)

css.dot: position: absolute; top: 8.33%; left: 54.16%; width: 6.668px; height: 6.668px; background-color: #E53935; border-radius: 50%;

limitations: Absolute pixel position not returned by MCP API; calculated from percentage insets
Visibility condition (boolean prop) not exposed; requires component properties inspection
Border/shadow properties not available for ellipse nodes via MCP
recommendation: Use calculated size (6.668px) rounded to 7px for implementation; position via top/left percentages for responsive scaling
